rows.label: qst200502_0010
rows.name:
Meleph, would you mind
helping in the kitchen?

rows.label: qst200502_0020
rows.name: Hmm? You want me to help?

rows.label: qst200502_0030
rows.name:
Yeah, I'm sure you'd be first
rate at this kind of thing.

rows.label: qst200502_0040
rows.name:
Really? Well, I don't have much
experience, but I'll do what I can.

rows.label: qst200502_0050
rows.name:
Tora and Hana... Could I ask you
to get some more ingredients?

rows.label: qst200502_0090
rows.name:
102 measures of Mookah
Flour...and 57 Cranberry Bells.

rows.label: qst200502_0100
rows.name: Got it! Tora and Hana will fetch!

rows.label: qst200502_0110
rows.name:
Byakko, could you perhaps go
and get the other essentials?

rows.label: qst200502_0120
rows.name:
Why, of course. I'll
be back in a jiffy.

rows.label: qst200502_0130
rows.name:
Everyone else... You're
in charge of PR!

rows.label: qst200502_0140
rows.name:
Roll up! Yuou's Just Desserts
is officially open!

rows.label: qst200502_0150
rows.name:
Come see! Possibly the first
chance in history to taste
the Blade-made desserts!

rows.label: qst200502_0160
rows.name: Forget the rest! Get the best!
